title: Textile, "The Wedding", 1950
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: silkscreen printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 914.4 x 92.7 cm (30 ft. x 36 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Robert A. and Lynne C. Adams
description: A cartoon of a wedding scene, with the bride and groom at center, surrounded by family members, with children in the foreground. In black on a pink ground.
